import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Trusted Repository, Image, and Registry</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v33.00/trust/data"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"policyContainers"}
```



Returns the trusted registries, repositories, and images.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL command:

```bash
$ curl -k \                                                                     
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/trust/data
```

## cURL Response

Refer to the following example response:

```bash
$ {
 "policy": {
   "_id": "trust",
   "enabled": false,
   "rules": [
```

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Data holds the image trust data

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>groups</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Groups are the trust groups.


</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"_id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Name of the group.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"disabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Indicates whether the rule is currently disabled. Values: true (disabled) or false (enabled).\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"images"} required={false} schemaName={"string (string)[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Image names or IDs (e.g., docker.io/library/ubuntu:16.04 / SHA264@...).\n","items":{"type":"string","title":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"layers"} required={false} schemaName={"string (string)[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Filesystem layers. The image is trusted if its layers have a prefix of the trusted groups layer in the same order.\n","items":{"type":"string","title":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"modified"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies the date and time when the rule was last modified.\n","format":"date-time","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Name of the rule.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"notes"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Describes any noteworthy points for a rule. You can include any text.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"owner"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"User who created or last modified the rule.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"previousName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Previous name of the rule. Required for rule renaming.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>policy</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Policy represents the trust policy

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"_id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ID is the trust group policy ID.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether the policy is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>rules</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Rules is the list of rules in the policy.


</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"allowedGroups"} required={false} schemaName={"string (string)[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AllowedGroups are the ids of the groups that are whitelisted by this rule.\n","items":{"type":"string","title":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"blockMsg"} required={false} schemaName={"common.PolicyBlockMsg (string)"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"PolicyBlockMsg represent the block message in a Policy","type":"string","title":"common.PolicyBlockMsg"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>collections</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Collections is a list of collections the rule applies to.


</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountIDs"}
